abstract: Latest phase of Precision Medicine Initiative, 10-year federal research project intended to develop medical treatments designed around specific traits of individual patients, will involve collection of DNA samples and medical, personal and lifestyle data from one million volunteers; pool of patients will reflect geographic, racial, ethnic and socioeconomic diversity of American population, and volunteers will participate in project's steering committee and advisory board sessions.
lead_paragraph: Government scientists want a million volunteers to share the secrets of their genes and lives for a research project into the causes and cures of disease.

headline.main: Uncle Sam Wants You — Or at Least Your Genetic and Lifestyle Information
headline.print_headline: Uncle Sam Wants You — Or at Least Your Genetic and Lifestyle Information

snippet: Government scientists want a million volunteers to share the secrets of their genes and lives for a research project into the causes and cures of disease....
